posts.post_content:
Selling this Cy Young Glove Shown, graded SGC A for very obvious reasons. Back is a Piedmont 360-450 factory 25 to spare you the eye strain. What you see is what you get, but there are remarkably few if, any, flaws other than the obvious ones. No wrinkles, spider creases, etc. 

This is on eBay at a much higher BIN/BO.

Asking $550 net to me delivered, or best offer -- SOLD

[IMG]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/pw/ACtC-3f8VbSvU6NToxYJAIAAK2PDC8gzjBcbUOdIjao9D4M5ZFpTMCEgHZgiC_DrMV3icdeHkeIP-jpIm_E687dfXJuhpmAcYO7xmfqYMFnJK6P6k-LEh40y6vXKSnxyI20cqX6f30OQHnW9FLlnOPAXzWPb1Q=w345-h554-no?authuser=0[/IMG][IMG]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/pw/ACtC-3eAwZZMZ1InLBvZFJKjq0ArunONBibwCPidDcw5LdD7mo9m9Ck0vYcctrd0O9BXTN94j4xWfSaOI1HPzrXzRGkLpFhxEKsDDpTp9S9MMYy_esojGAFB3tkQ8lo72wseaFzrffmoegkKW0E1BvwH4cbP_g=w345-h554-no?authuser=0[/IMG]

Hey Dan! We were just discussing this card on Twitter last week. I love this card but I’m looking a bit further ahead at another big guy this summer. This sure makes me sad...maybe one day I’ll run into him again

[quote name="Kevin" post=2116358]Hey Dan! We were just discussing this card on Twitter last week. I love this card but I’m looking a bit further ahead at another big guy this summer. This sure makes me sad...maybe one day I’ll run into him again[/QUOTE]

Thanks Kevin! Always a chance this doesn't sell and I hold onto it for the time being, so if you find that you have interest in the future, please feel free to reach out

[quote name="grandcards" post=2116368]Thanks Kevin! Always a chance this doesn't sell and I hold onto it for the time being, so if you find that you have interest in the future, please feel free to reach out[/QUOTE]

Thank you so much. He’s! If he doesn’t move, definitely keep me in mind.
